info.name: Dubtracky
info.description: Tweaks for Dubtrack.FM Requires Stylish, grab it here > Firefox - Chrome - Opera Important: read the notes for a description of each option ↓↓↓ Select options below ↓↓↓
info.additionalInfo: --History-- 1.2.3 - updated. 1.2.2 - added option to change chat font. 1.2.1 - changed borders and background opacity; adjusted chat elements. 1.2 - added options for player. 1.1 - released. ============================================================ --Options-- Change background (default ON) Swaps the default room background with a custom one. Chose an image from the list below. Background Image (default option #1) Replaces the background with the selected image. You can also link or upload one. Recommended size: 1920x1080 Player Options (default option #2) Reduce Opacity: lowers the opacity, shows player on mouse hover. Reduce Opacity and Resize: same as above, player box is also smaller. Don't Install: use default player Change background (default Ms Sans Serif) Changes the font used in the chat to the one selected. Example If the selected font isn't available, it will use the next one in the list (order: ms sans serif > segoe ui > trebuchet ms > tahoma > arial).

options.label: Install
Reduce Opacity and Resize

settings.label: Change Chat Font (example in options below)

options.label: Ms Sans Serif
